post.description: Webhook is a place holder to describe webhook response in swagger.
post.summary: Webhook is a place holder to describe webhook response in swagger.

checksum.description: the md5 checksum of the original file for easier verification

crypto_chain_uri.description: the ID of the chain to use in URI format. e.g. "ethereum://42/<tokenaddress>"

crypto_transaction_id.description: the transaction in which the payment happened

id.description: identifying this payment. could be a sequential number, could be a transaction hash of the crypto payment

reference.description: payment reference (e.g. reference field on bank transfer)

sender_country.description: country ISO code of the sender of this invoice

sender_street_1.description: street and address details of the sender company

total_amount.description: the total amount of the line item

account_id.description: account_id is the account associated to webhook

from_id.description: from_id if provided, original trigger of the event

to_id.description: to_id if provided, final destination of the event

deposit_address.description: Deposit address for NFT Token created

document_id.description: if provided, creates the next version of the document.
